STANDARD MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONSEducation:Advanced University degree in Social sciences, International development, Development economics or other field relevant to international development assistance, or First University Degree with additional years of related work experience and/or trainings/courses.Language: Fluency in English and Persian language Experience:At least 5 years of relevant and solid experience in: Designing, managing, monitoring, and reporting on crisis response projects.
Has gained experience in implementing technical programs
Has implemented programmes and provided input into designing operations
Has provided input into policy discussions and decisions
Experience in managing teams and working with people with different professional and cultural backgrounds and nationalities.
Experience working with corporate systems (databases, software).
Proficient computer literacy.Job Details
